com.github.ruleant.unitconversion

Interface UnitConversionInterface


  • public interface UnitConversionInterface
    Unit Conversion class interface.
    Author:
    Dieter Adriaenssens

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int UNIT_DEFAULT
      It will use the default unit of the conversion class, so no conversion is needed.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getConvertedValue()
      Converts the current value to the output unit, if necessary.
      String getFormattedValue()
      Converts the value to the set output unit, scales and formats it, and adds a localized unit.
      String getUnit()
      Returns a localized string of the current output unit.
      void setOutputUnit(int unit)
      Sets the unit that will be used when formatting a value.
      void setValue(double value, int unit)
      Sets value, which will be converted to class unit, if necessary.

    • Field Detail

      • UNIT_DEFAULT

        static final int UNIT_DEFAULT
        It will use the default unit of the conversion class, so no conversion is needed.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • setValue

        void setValue(double value,
            int unit)
        Sets value, which will be converted to class unit, if necessary.
        Parameters:
        value - New value
        unit - Unit of the new value

      • setOutputUnit

        void setOutputUnit(int unit)
        Sets the unit that will be used when formatting a value.
        Parameters:
        unit - Unit of the formatted value.

      • getUnit

        String getUnit()
        Returns a localized string of the current output unit.
        Returns:
        localized unit string

      • getConvertedValue

        double getConvertedValue()
        Converts the current value to the output unit, if necessary.
        Returns:
        value converted to selected unit

      • getFormattedValue

        String getFormattedValue()
        Converts the value to the set output unit, scales and formats it, and adds a localized unit.
        Returns:
        formatted value
